DOC.detailed_description: All patient premedicated oral midazolam 5-15 mg. one hour surgery . In operating room , patient monitor noninvasive blood pressure , ECG pulse oximetry . After patient anesthetized , direct blood pressure , end-tidal carbon dioxide tension ( ETCO2 ) esophageal temperature monitor . Choice anesthesia general anesthesia double lumen endobronchial tube ( Bronchocath ) . Patient induce propofol 1.5-2.5 mg/kg fentanyl 2 μg/kg . After patient unconscious , cisatracurium 0.2 mg/kg give facilitate intubation . Patient ventilate 50 % oxygen air . Anesthesia maintain propofol 6 -12 mg/kg/hr 1 μg/kg fentanyl give intermittently every 1-1.5 hour order keep blood pressure heart rate within 20 % baseline . Cisatracurium ( 0.03 mg/kg ) give every 30 minute order control ventilation . The patient ventilate volume control ventilator . Throughout surgery , ETCO2 keep 30-35 mmHg . During two lung ventilation , airway pressure keep within 20 cmH2O respiratory rate 10-12 beats/minute . One lung ventilation achieve airway pressure le 30 cmH2O respiratory rate 12-20 beats/minute . During surgery , low part patient warm force air warmer ( Bier Hugger ) At end surgery , neuromuscular blockade reverse prostigmine 2.5 mg atropine 1.2 mg . In post anesthesia care unit , I.V . PCA machine connect patient . The set PCA basal infusion morphine 1 mg/hr bolus morphine 1 mg lockout interval 5 minute 4-hour limit 30 mg .
